setup_commands: (command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba create -p ./env python=3.10 -y) || (command -v conda >/dev/null 2>&1 && conda create -p ./env python=3.10 -y) || (echo "Warning: Neither mamba nor conda found, creating venv instead" && python3 -m venv ./env)

(command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba run -p ./env pip install pandas numpy scikit-learn matplotlib seaborn tqdm loguru click) || ./env/bin/pip install pandas numpy scikit-learn matplotlib seaborn tqdm loguru click
(command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba install -p ./env -c conda-forge rdkit -y) || ./env/bin/pip install rdkit
